original_text: And when inquisition was made of the matter, it was found out; therefore they were both hanged on a tree: and it was written in the book of the chronicles before the king.
korean_text: 조사하여 실증을 얻었으므로 두 사람을 나무에 달고 그 일을 왕 앞에서 궁중 일기에 기록하니라

sentences.original_text: And when inquisition was made of the matter
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 일에 대해 조사가 이루어졌을 때

sentences.original_text: therefore they were both hanged on a tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 둘 다 나무에 매달렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and it was written in the book of the chronicles
